guide.introduction:
have you wondered,

i need more flashing lights in here?

aha a disco ball!

easy step by step info on your own mini disco ball with all the cool flashes

i need more flashing lights in here?

aha a disco ball!

easy step by step info on your own mini disco ball with all the cool flashes

lines.text: Step 1. get your supplies together, you'll need hot glue and gun,hobby knife,mini mirrors or cut up cd's,used duct tape roll,safty glasses,motor,battery,24" wire, and a soldering gun.
lines.text_raw: Step 1. get your supplies together, you'll need hot glue and gun,hobby knife,mini mirrors or cut up cd's,used duct tape roll,safty glasses,motor,battery,24" wire, and a soldering gun.

lines.text: step 2. take the emptied roll of duct tape(with no duct tape on it) cut a 1 1/2" hole at top (make sure your motor will fit in there,)after that you will heat up your hot glue gun.make sure your mini mirrors or cut up cds fit on the roll.
lines.text_raw: step 2. take the emptied roll of duct tape(with no duct tape on it) cut a 1 1/2" hole at top (make sure your motor will fit in there,)after that you will heat up your hot glue gun.make sure your mini mirrors or cut up cds fit on the roll.

lines.text: now hot glue your mini mirrors or cut cd's onto the roll, hint make sure your mirrors are slanted so that they can hit,and see eachother.
lines.text_raw: now hot glue your mini mirrors or cut cd's onto the roll, hint make sure your mirrors are slanted so that they can hit,and see eachother.

lines.text: take your motor and with a gear on the end glue that gear into the middle of the roll,so that it can still fit out the end that you cut
lines.text_raw: take your motor and with a gear on the end glue that gear into the middle of the roll,so that it can still fit out the end that you cut

lines.text: make sure the motor can turn without hitting anything
lines.text_raw: make sure the motor can turn without hitting anything

lines.text: now you are going to cut the 24" wire into 2 halfs which is 12". Then solder the wire to the motor,and the other sides you are going to solder to a piece of metal,like from a metal nail or something, and solder the other side of the other wire to another piece of metal then put your 12 v. battery between the 2 metal piece put a RUBBER band around the to make it stay!
lines.text_raw: now you are going to cut the 24" wire into 2 halfs which is 12". Then solder the wire to the motor,and the other sides you are going to solder to a piece of metal,like from a metal nail or something, and solder the other side of the other wire to another piece of metal then put your 12 v. battery between the 2 metal piece put a RUBBER band around the to make it stay!

lines.text: lastly of the last, you go into a bathroom with a mirror and a lazer pointer you can turn off the lights,and point the lazer at the mirror make it spin(turn it on) and tada.
lines.text_raw: lastly of the last, you go into a bathroom with a mirror and a lazer pointer you can turn off the lights,and point the lazer at the mirror make it spin(turn it on) and tada.

lines.text: If you want you can make your own mirrors around the room your in by marking the spots it hits and then putting mirrors there hand with string!
